page.title: 02Family Life in Knebworth
page.content: My Mum is the first one up at about 7.30 a.m. because it takes her half an hour to get to work in Luton. After dressing and washing she goes downstairs and makes breakfast of cornflakes, toast and marmalade and tea. Dad is up last and after showering he comes down to breakfast before leaving for work at British Aerospace in Stevenage. I run to school with my sister. At twelve o'clock the bell rings and we go out to play football while waiting for lunch. After school I run home and get changed to play out with my friends, or sometimes I go to the Stevenage Leisure Centre to play badminton. When I get home I have tea, which is chips and something and then watch television until about 8.3O when I go up to bed. I usually read a while before I go to sleep.
